title: Bertazzoni Convection Speed oven - Professional Series
description:
CONVECTION SPEED OVEN

With it's family-sized capacity, the combined multi-function electric and microwave oven has convection, regular or broiler heating modes with a microwave boost function to reduce cooking times significantly compared with a conventional oven. 

In microwave mode it has five power levels. The oven can also be used for conventional electric cooking if required and includes a full-width electric broiler.
